# Wraps python functions

Note: Functions taking `Tensor` arguments can also take anything accepted by
[`tf.convert_to_tensor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/convert_to_tensor.md).

[TOC]

<h2 id="Script_Language_Operators">Script Language Operators</h2>

TensorFlow provides allows you to wrap python/numpy functions as
TensorFlow operators.

*   [`tf.py_func`](../../api_docs/python/tf/py_func.md)
